patthana4.5:6.1: Kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:7.1: Akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:8.1: Abyākataṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:9.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana4.5:12.1: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.5:13.1: Akusalo sārammaṇo dhammo akusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.5:14.1: Abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo abyākatassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.5:15.1: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:16.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta … pe … sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre … pe … sampayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana4.5:19.1: Abyākataṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:23.1: Abyākato anārammaṇo dhammo abyākatassa anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo (sabbattha ekaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.5:26.1: Kusalo citto dhammo kusalassa cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:27.1: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta … pe … upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, natthiyā satta, vigate satta.
patthana4.5:30.1: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:31.1: Akusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:32.1: Abyākataṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:33.1: Kusalaṃ nocittañca abyākataṃ nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:34.1: Akusalaṃ nocittañca abyākataṃ nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:35.1: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.5:36.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.5:37.1: Kusalo nocitto dhammo kusalassa nocittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:38.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana4.5:41.1: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:42.1: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:43.1: Abyākataṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:44.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana4.5:47.1: Kusalo cetasiko dhammo kusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.5:48.1: Akusalo cetasiko dhammo akusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.5:49.1: Abyākato cetasiko dhammo abyākatassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.5:50.1: Kusalo cetasiko dhammo kusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:51.1: Akusalo cetasiko dhammo akusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:52.1: Abyākato cetasiko dhammo abyākatassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:53.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta … pe … sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre … pe … sampayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana4.5:55.1: Kusalaṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:56.1: Akusalaṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:57.1: Abyākataṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:58.1: Kusalaṃ acetasikañca abyākataṃ acetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:59.1: Akusalaṃ acetasikañca abyākataṃ acetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:60.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana4.5:61.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana4.5:64.15: kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:65.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana4.5:69.1: Abyākataṃ ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:70.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana4.5:72.1: Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo kusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:72.2: Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo akusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:72.3: Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo abyākatassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana4.5:73.1: Akusalo ajjhattiko dhammo akusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:74.1: Abyākato ajjhattiko dhammo abyākatassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:75.1: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā … pe … samanantare satta, sahajāte nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane tīṇi, vipāke āhāre indriye ekaṃ … pe … vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana4.5:77.1: Kusalaṃ bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:78.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.5:79.1: Kusalo bāhiro dhammo kusalassa bāhirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:80.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana4.5:84.1: Abyākato upādā dhammo abyākatassa upādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:85.1: Āhāre ekaṃ, indriye atthiyā avigate ekaṃ.
patthana4.5:86.1: Kusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:87.1: Akusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:88.1: Abyākataṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:89.1: Kusalaṃ noupādā ca abyākataṃ noupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:90.1: Akusalaṃ noupādā ca abyākataṃ noupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:91.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.5:93.1: Kusalo noupādā dhammo kusalassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:94.1: Akusalo noupādā dhammo akusalassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:95.1: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.5:96.1: Kusalo noupādā dhammo kusalassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:97.1: Akusalo noupādā dhammo akusalassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:98.1: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:99.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare … pe … sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye upanissaye nava … pe … vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate ekādasa.
patthana4.5:103.1: Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:104.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana4.5:106.1: Kusalaṃ anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:107.1: Akusalaṃ anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:108.1: Abyākataṃ anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:109.1: Kusalaṃ anupādinnañca abyākataṃ anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.5:110.1: Akusalaṃ anupādinnañca abyākataṃ anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:111.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.5:114.1: Kusalo anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:119.1: Abyākato anupādinno dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:119.2: Abyākato anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.5:119.3: Abyākato anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.5:120.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha … pe … sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi … pe … vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate ekādasa.
patthana4.5:123.1: Akusalaṃ upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.5:124.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
